attributes.action: enforce Greater manchester Police to keep searching for Keith bennett's body
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keith bennett was twelve years old when he was murdered by Ian Brady and Myra Hindley.His body was buried in a shallow grave on Saddleworth moor and despite police searches,he has never been found.Last week Greater Manchester Police announced that they were calling off the search and had no plans to search again in the future.Keith's Mother Winnie Johnson is seventy five years old and her only wish is to find Keith and give him the funeral that he deserves.Please help this Lady find her son and let her have some closure and live the rest of her life in peace,knowing that Keith has been brought home to her.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
